text.1: Essential reading for those of you working on (or thinking about) electrochemical nitrogen reduction.  #N2RR @NatureComms      https://t.co/fwWUW0Q2y4
text.2:
Research on the N2 reduction to #ammonia is young and often problematic:
https://t.co/MzaQeN9hkj

The scrutiny of the #NRR field in @NatureComms by @ChemistryMonash @ARC_ACES team
